name: AOI Fire Lodge
tags: ["hsp_activation|https://link.springer.com/article/10.1134/S2079057020010099|Heat-Shock Proteins (HSP-70/90) refold damaged proteins & ramp up cellular repair—so you recover faster and feel less sore post-sauna.","circulation_boost|https://tandf.figshare.com/articles/journal_contribution/The_effects_of_a_single_and_a_series_of_Finnish_sauna_sessions_on_the_immune_response_and_HSP-70_levels_in_trained_and_untrained_men/22144697|Sauna heat doubles blood flow and heart rate, delivering oxygen & nutrients more efficiently—powering your energy and flush-out.","heavy_metal_detox|https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24558242|Sweating at 80–90 °C ferries out toxins like lead, mercury & arsenic—helping you de-puff and purify from the inside out.","lymphatic_drain|https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1876382016304140|Mild heat stress opens lymph vessels, accelerating fluid clearance and reducing tissue swelling—so your skin looks—and feels—firmer.","inflammation_reduction|https://saunaarea.com/heat-shock-proteins-sauna|HSPs stabilize antioxidant systems (e.g., glutathione) and tune down inflammatory signals—helping lower aches and joint stiffness long after you leave.","hormesis|https://www.jillcarnahan.com/2025/03/28/want-to-stay-sharp-and-age-well-why-infrared-saunas-are-a-game-changer/|A controlled ~3 °C core rise triggers hormesis—strengthening stress defenses so you bounce back more resilient to daily challenges."]
short_description: Step into the 80–90 °C cedar-infused Inradred Saun: a 15 min heat shock that activates HSP-70/90, doubles circulation, and sweats out heavy metals and toxins—priming your body for deeper frequency work.
